settings.name: G Kalyan Sai Goud
settings.title: Software Engineer
settings.summary: Results-driven Computer Science Engineer skilled in full-stack web development, RESTful APIs, and data analytics with a passion for scalable applications.

items.description: I work on developing, maintaining, and troubleshooting software for transportation devices used in smart mobility and fare collection systems. My role involves debugging device issues, validating firmware updates, enhancing performance, and ensuring reliable field operations through efficient engineering support.

items.title: E-Commerce Web Application
items.description: Developed a full-stack e-commerce platform using Spring Boot, Hibernate, React, and MySQL with secure REST APIs for product and order management. Implemented authentication, session management, and role-based access to enhance user experience. Optimized database queries and API performance for improved scalability and responsiveness.

items.title: EV Charging Station Finder WebApp
items.description: Built a web-based application for EV users to locate and reserve charging stations with real-time updates. Integrated authentication, booking workflows, and admin management for station monitoring. Designed APIs to synchronize station data and ensure efficient reservation handling.

items.title: Quiz Application
items.description: Designed and developed a quiz management system using Spring Boot with REST APIs for quizzes, users, and scores. Implemented quiz creation, question retrieval, and result computation logic using JPA and MySQL. Ensured structured validation, error handling, and modular backend design for scalability.

items.title: SQL Employee Database Management
items.description: Designed a normalized relational database schema for employees, departments, and salaries. Wrote optimized SQL queries and joins for analytics and reporting. Implemented indexing and constraints to maintain data integrity and improve query performance.

items.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science

items.title: Tata Cybersecurity Security Analyst Job Simulation on Forage
Coursera - Programming Foundations with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
